items.label: The Prescribing Provider Is an Endocrinologist or Weight Management Specialist.
items.validation: If Not, Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation). You can check a providers NPI number here: https://npiregistry.cms.hhs.gov/search by entering their NPI number and clicking search. In the result look for the Taxonomy of the provider.

items.label: Documented current baseline body mass index (BMI) ≥ 30 kg/m^2.
items.validation: An initial BMI of less than 30 kg/m^2 is unlikely to be approved.

items.label: Document the patient will NOT be using the requested agent in combination with another targeted weight loss agent for the requested indication
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Document the patient will NOT be using Wegovy in combination with another GLP-1 receptor agonist agent
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Documented current baseline weight.
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Document patient has attempted to lose weight through a KP-approved weight loss program, and will continue these interventions while on Wegovy.
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: The Prescribing Provider Is an Endocrinologist or Weight Management Specialist.
items.validation: If Not, Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Documented current baseline body mass index (BMI) ≥ 30 kg/m^2.
items.validation: An initial BMI of less than 30 kg/m^2 is unlikely to be approved.

items.label: Document the patient will NOT be using the requested agent in combination with another targeted weight loss agent for the requested indication
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Document the patient will NOT be using Wegovy in combination with another GLP-1 receptor agonist agent
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Documented current baseline weight.
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Document patient has attempted to lose weight through a KP-approved weight loss program, and will continue these interventions while on Wegovy.
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Document patient is following Kaiser National Adult Diabetes Guidelines and CBC step therapy criteria for use of preferred agents for diabetes control.
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Documented intolerance, contraindication, or failure to reach goal A1c after at least 6 month trial of Victoza or Ozempic.
items.validation: If the patient hasn't tried Victoza or Ozempic, ask the order prescriber that insurance requires these to be tried first.

items.label: Documentated loss of at least 10 percent of baseline body weight in the previous 3 months.
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.

items.label: Patient continues to meet initial review critieria
items.validation: Stop and contact provider to document this in the patient's chart. Add to your PA submission.
